Question
========

The pH (acidity) of the liquid is crucial for regulation of the dye absorption in cashmere sweaters. Research shows that the pH in a normal distribution with a mean of 3.22 and a standard deviation of 0.127. You will take a random sample of 5 sweaters. What then is the 95% confidence interval of the sample mean?

Answerlist
----------

* 1,61 ± 1,96(0,057)
* 3,22 ± 1,96(0,057)
* 3,22 ± 1,96(0,127)
* 3,22 ± 1,96(2,236)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1,61 ± 1,96(0,057): Incorrect
* 3,22 ± 1,96(0,057): Correct
* 3,22 ± 1,96(0,127): Incorrect
* 3,22 ± 1,96(2,236): Incorrect
